MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY15 postcode area of Montgomery, affecting properties in Arthurs Gate, Pool Road, and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:12 am. Our engineers are on site investigating a suspected fault on the underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35 am on 19th January, 2021.
